n0:runOracleScript.n0:source: prompt --application/shared_components/credentials/idcs_web_credential begin -- Manifest -- CREDENTIAL: IDCS Web Credential -- Manifest End wwv_flow_api.component_begin ( p_version_yyyy_mm_dd=>'2020.10.01' ,p_release=>'20.2.0.00.20' ,p_default_workspace_id=>9748850854216151 ,p_default_application_id=>103 ,p_default_id_offset=>0 ,p_default_owner=>'DEMO' ); wwv_flow_api.create_credential( p_id=>wwv_flow_api.id(14209579635296066) ,p_name=>'IDCS Web Credential' ,p_static_id=>'IDCS_Web_Credential' ,p_authentication_type=>'BASIC' ,p_prompt_on_install=>true ); wwv_flow_api.component_end; end;
